title: x/mobile: Segmentation fault: 11 on 0px window resize
body:
If I resize the window vertically to 0px height, I get the following error on the terminal.

```bash
Segmentation fault: 11
```

I am using the following:

* OS X 10.10.5
* `go version go1.5.1 darwin/amd64`
* `gomobile version +afa8a11 Fri Sep 18 00:19:08 2015 +0000 (android,ios);`
